name: Dream (itch) (Story Games)
description:
This is a mini game work in progress. Dream world with a soothing atmosphere.

Manty the little pink manta ray is sleeping and having a dream of a clean and pure ocean. Help Manty to bobble hook as many as you can in her dream world. Lets save her home in the sea!

How to play:

  • Arrows/WASD to move
  • Space to boost
  • Ctrl to shoot bobble

Hope you enjoy this demo! 
And if you have any thoughts or questions about this game, leave me a message. I would appreciate that, thank you!

Fun fact: Did you know that in the real life there really is pink manta ray?
He cruises the waters around Lady Elliot Island,  and is the only known pink manta ray in the world. First spotted in 2015, Inspector Clouseau (that is his name) has been seen fewer than 10 times since. 

Read more: https://www.nationalgeographic.com/animals/article/pink-manta-ray-australia-rare
